Subbed Projects.Show Name: Kara no Kyoukai 4: Garan no Dou

Good Comments: Higher res than gg. Typesetting on gg's was better though.
Bad Comments: Very bad translation. This movie was also done in the past by gg and Coalgirls also did it recently. I would recommend their version since they are usually the two best groups.

Good Comments: Great subs. No spelling or grammar errors.
Did a great job with a font fitting perfectly the mood of this last chapter.
Bad Comments: Only person who voted negatively didn't realize 66 and gg are the same group.

Worth watching. Almost as good as Coalgirls, even though Coalgirls and 66 both "borrowed" the subs from gg's release. Good animation also. I might have hit disapprove on this by accident so I apologize because this is definitely a job well done.
